duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, test, and maintain robust and scalable web applications using .NET and Angular technologies.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement user-friendly interfaces and ensure seamless user experiences.
Design and implement RESTful APIs for communication between front-end and back-end systems.
Work with databases, creating and optimizing database schemas, and writing efficient queries.
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality, performance, and adherence to coding standards.
Troubleshoot and debug issues in both front-end and back-end components and provide timely resolutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers and other developers, to define and implement software solutions.
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in Full Stack development and contribute ideas to enhance team productivity and product quality.
Continuously refactor and improve code to maintain a high level of code quality and performance.
Participate in Agile development methodologies, including sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
